regras.descricao: sigla - Formato incorreto
regras.regra: not ( regexp_match( sigla, '^(AC|AL|AM|AP|BA|CE|DF|ES|GO|MA|MG|MS|MT|PA|PB|PE|PI|PR|RJ|RN|RO|RR|RS|SC|SE|SP|TO)-\d\d\d$') or regexp_match( sigla, '^(BR)-\d\d\d$') or regexp_match( sigla, '^(BR)-\d\d\d;(BR|AC|AL|AM|AP|BA|CE|DF|ES|GO|MA|MG|MS|MT|PA|PB|PE|PI|PR|RJ|RN|RO|RR|RS|SC|SE|SP|TO)-\d\d\d$') or regexp_match( sigla, '^(AC|AL|AM|AP|BA|CE|DF|ES|GO|MA|MG|MS|MT|PA|PB|PE|PI|PR|RJ|RN|RO|RR|RS|SC|SE|SP|TO)-\d\d\d;(AC|AL|AM|AP|BA|CE|DF|ES|GO|MA|MG|MS|MT|PA|PB|PE|PI|PR|RJ|RN|RO|RR|RS|SC|SE|SP|TO)-\d\d\d$') or sigla is NULL or sigla ='')
